website_summaries.verdict: This mid-priced rack features a nice stainless steel look and is easy to use and store.
pros: Fast setup, and rotates for easy use
Comes with a pasta transfer wand
cons: Some buyers report durability issues with this option (breaks easily)

customer_reviews.title: Innovative and simply excellent pasta drying rack!
customer_reviews.text: When I decided to make fresh pasta at home, I looked for the best, most innovative product designs available at a fair price. Your Pasta Drying Rack fit my requirements perfectly. Originally, I bought a wooden drying rack, but found it to be cheap and clumsy. I returned it and bought your because of its compacts, clean look and operation. Having everything fit together in one design is ingenious. I highly recommend it. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Ganem III

customer_reviews.title: Large, sturdy, and functional
customer_reviews.text: Let me first say that this product is probably significantly larger than you imagine! Being cased in metal, the tube is actually quite heavy, and about as awkward as a rolling pin to store. However, the size also means that it can hold a lot of pasta, which is great, because my baker-slash-pasta-maker partner always makes big batches. The rack holds up well to the weight of a good deal of wet noodles, and the arms do not come down or break when in use. Other than that, it's a pretty straightforward product. I chose this one over the wooden racks for ease of cleaning and for durability. I am pleased with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Vee

customer_reviews.title: Confidant of all spaghetti producers!
customer_reviews.text: Since I finished the course on how to make spaghetti, I’ve been love in making my own spaghetti. The drying rack is necessary, but the traditional racks are taking up a large place... I bought this creative item at once after I read the introduction. It is really easy to store and easy to clean with the detachable design. Never worry the rack will fall or scratch counter while using, its silicone feet can keep it steady and protective. I have recommended this creative item to all my cooking course classmates!!!A definite “must buy” if you make your own pasta!!!
customer_reviews.author: vicky

customer_reviews.title: NASA's prototype for noodle drying
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a rack that was large but also easily stored when not in use. There are many available that fill that need but this one may be the most compact. Drying rods appear to be made of acrylic so they could break during rough handling. But I do not think noodle drying and rough handling will ever occur simultaneously at my house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, once.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and liked the way it folds up. It worked great once, but fell apart on the second use. Plastic parts that make up the drying rod folding mechanism is not very sturdy. Cheaply made. I have a cheap $5 rack that is holding up much better than this one did.
customer_reviews.author: diyguy

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart on it's first use.
customer_reviews.text: As I was taking it out to use the very first time, the top slipped off onto the floor three feet and broke. The ball bearings rolled everywhere, and the casing holding them and the lid shattered. Be VERY careful when holding it in it's tube shape, because if it is tipped one way the slightest bit the guts will fall all over the floor and smash to pieces. It's disappointing because this was a present for my wife, and now I look like the jerk for buying cheap junk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not meet my standards
customer_reviews.text: Unit broke, poor design, returned for refund. Can not recommend purchase.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Breaks too easily
customer_reviews.text: I used this thing three times before the plastic that holds all the ball bearings snapped and little silver balls were rolling across the kitchen floor. Stick with those wooden pasta racks. They may take longer to assemble but one broken piece won’t make you trash the whole thing like this plastic pasta stand.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: It's not good
customer_reviews.text: Sucks. One leg broke right away. Came already looking cheap
customer_reviews.author: Rory Martin

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart on opening
customer_reviews.text: It fell apart as soon as I open the box and the ball bearings rolled all over my kitchen
customer_reviews.author: amy stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Stores easily for limited space
customer_reviews.text: Loved it so much, I ordered one for my son. I grew up making homemade pasta with my grandparents and carried the tradition with my children. We have a large family and make lots of pasta at one time, this stand saves room and makes it easier for all of us. Can't wait for my son to try his stand now! Love how nicely it folds up for storage too. Including my whole wheat pasta dinner to see how great this worked for us.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: innovative sleek lightweight but sturdy design i love the way this pasta rack folds away for easy storage. Made squid ink pasta, worked out perfectly on the drying rack
customer_reviews.author: Chandler Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice drying stand, easy to clean and store
customer_reviews.text: Prior to getting this stand, I used to dry my pasta on floured parchment paper. I found this stand to be easy to use. And I am able to get all of the pasta in the pot much quicker. This helps with more even cooking with less strands sticking together.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Larson

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I previously bought the wooden stand, shown as a comparison product. I used it 10 times or so and then one of the dowels got stuck and broke. Also I didn't like that it was pretty bulky, and that the drying pasta kind stuck to it. This product, however, addresses all of these concerns. It is well designed and constructed, and I'm looking forward to many uses!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pasta rack
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this item. It stores so easily, sets up in a snap, and holds a large amount of pasta. I get happy every time I pull it out to use it. Best choice ever!
customer_reviews.author: debbiejo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, practical product.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this drying rack! It is graceful and useful and clever and attractive and stores in just a tiny bit of space.
customer_reviews.author: D. Kaspersen

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after only a few uses
customer_reviews.text: It's a cool concept. But unfortunately at the critical rod hinge points the plastic is very thin and is unable to withstand / support the cantilevered weight of the pasta. My advice do not purchase this item.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I like the way this item is designed. Folds up easily. Great for drying pasta.
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and store away
customer_reviews.text: Love This thing!! Always love fun kitchen things like this!!! Works awesome, easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Shana D

customer_reviews.title: I was also pleased with the price for the quality of product we ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product as a gift for my wife to go along with her new Kitchenaid pasta rollers. My decision was primarily based on the uniqueness of the rack itself - it isn’t a copy of all the other racks being offered. I was also pleased with the price for the quality of product we received. When it comes to actual functionality, I’ll have to let my wife leave her own review. When searching for like products in the future I will definitely keep Kitchendao at the top of my list... Two thumbs up and 5 stars all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H. Mackoy

product_meta.title: Foldable Pasta Drying Rack | Compact for Easy Storage | Quick Set-Up | Rotary System & Easy to Transfer | Anti-Slip Feet | Detachable for Easy Cleaning - by Kitchendao
feature_bullets: THE MOST COMPACT PASTA DRYING RACK ON THE MARKET: including pasta drying rack and pasta transfer wand. Equipped with 8 sturdy rods to carry up 3kg of pasta.
QUICK SET-UP: Set up the rack within 10 seconds
Detachable for easy cleaning and foldable for easy storage
LIFETIME 100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE. We’re confident with the quality and function. If you’re not happy with it, just send it back
